text:
Hi Guys, I have a really odd one here:

```{% set post_count = module.post_count - module.sticky|length %} // value 7
{% set count_test = 7 %} 

{% set rec_posts = blog_recent_posts(<http://module.blog|module.blog>, post_count) %} // this throws error in CLI : Error invoking function 'blog_recent_posts'
{% set rec_posts = blog_recent_posts(<http://module.blog|module.blog>, count_test) %} // this works```
Both post_count and count_test have a value of 7 but when I use post_count, the CLI won't upload the file because of an error invoking blog_recent_posts but it works fine with count_test. I can only think this is some kind of Hubl bug?

Many thanks

Hi

On the Search Results Page Is there a way to add the search term in the title of the page using hs-search-results__xxxxxx and is there a way to add a result count?

Hi all!

I am trying to preload some scripts on my pages settings, I am using the get_asset_url function to get the script asset, but the rendered url is different fot the link tag and the script tag, even if they are using exactly the same function. in the link tag I receive the //cdn url, and in the script I get the <Https://mydomain.com/asset>, both urls are correct. Somebody has an idea of how to fix? I need them to be equal so I can preload the script correclty.
This is my code.
`<link rel="preload" as="script" href="{{ get_asset_url(asset.js) }}"/>`
`<script src="{{ get_asset_url(asset.js) }}"></script>`
